divs: sighting detailslocation ; liverpool, england whilst walking my dog today with my partner tre, at about 11am this morning i glanced up to the sky to see an aeroplane and what seemed like a couple of red spheres come into the sky from nowhere. the spheres started to change into a white colour after about 1 minute. they were flying faster than the plane but not in any formation at first. then more started to appear up until about a total of 15 spheres started to slow and follow in the slip stream of the plane. i watched this occur for about 10 minutes until the sight of the plane and the spheres disappeared into the distance. when i got home, i got out my sat nav and recorded the exact location. both i and my partner witnessed this occurence. i also remember that each sphere had a white " aura " about it. in size to the plane, they were about 15 of them side by side equalled 3\4 of the plane. i am saying this is a possible sighting because of their speed, appearance from nowhere, the aura of the spheres, trailing the plane ( which i guess was a passenger jet at @ 20,000 feet ), the ability to be so close together as a bundle until they fell into a formation of following the plane. unfortunately, i could not take a photograph with my mobile phone as it was a sunny morning and to high for a picture. the spheres did not appear to be balloons as their actions were to deliberate.
Summary: Sighting in sky of approx 15 white spheres following a aeroplane.
